DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate effect 24- hr L-arginine infusion hemodynamic parameter microcirculation patient peripheral arterial occlusive disease ( PAOD ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect High Dose Arginine Infusion Hemodynamic Peripheral Microcirculation
DOC.criteria: female male patient receive peripheral bypass surgery age 55 75 year metabolic acidosis
